    S - the source type.

extends java.lang.Object
implements Notification
    Notification implementation for Core API.

    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • create

        public static <S> NotificationImpl<S> create(@Nonnull
                             java.lang.Throwable error,
                             @Nullable
                             java.lang.Object message)
        Create a notification from an error.
        Type Parameters:
        S - source type.
        Parameters:
        error - the error.
        message - optional message. Usually this is text or a LocalizedObjectKey. If the message appears to be formatted with an argument, the message will be used as a formatter argument.
        Returns:
        the notification.
